A new version is available, do you want: A new version is available, do you want to update?
Account It will unlink your account to t: Questo scollegherà il tuo account da questo computer.
I tuoi file non verranno eliminati
Address Cozy not cosy: Ops, l'indirizzo non è corretto. Prova con "cozy" con una "z"!
Address Don't have an account? Request o: Non hai un account? Richiedine uno qui
Address Invalid address: Ops, l'indirizzo non è corretto. Per connetterti al tuo cozy devi scrivere il suo URL, qualcosa del tipo https://tonystark.mycozy.cloud
Address No cozy instance at this address: Nessuna istanza cozy su questo indirizzo!
Address No email address: Hai scritto un indirizzo email. Per connetterti al tuo cozy devi scrivere il suo URL, qualcosa del tipo https://tonystark.mycozy.cloud
Address This is the web address you use: Questo è l'indirizzo web che utilizzi per entrare nel tuo cozy.
AppUpgrade An error happened during the: An error happened after we tried upgrading your Cozy Desktop version. Please contact support at contact@cozycloud.cc.
CGUUpdated Your Cozy hosting provider in: Your Cozy hosting provider informs you that it has updated its Terms of Service (ToS).
CGUUpdated Their acceptance is required: Their acceptance is required to continue using your Cozy.
Error Bad GLIBCXX version: Il tuo sistema ha una vecchia versione di glibc. Devi aggiornare la tua distribuzione, vedi https://cozy-labs.github.io/cozy-desktop/doc/usage/linux.html#supported-distributions
Error Check that the note still exists e: Check that the note still exists either on your Cozy or its owner's. This could also mean that the note is out of sync.
Error Your Cozy's disk space is saturate: Your Cozy's disk space is saturated
Error The {0} `{1}` could not be written: The {0} `{1}` could not be written to your Cozy's disk because its maximum storage capacity has been reached.
Error Synchronization will resume as soo: Synchronization will resume as soon as you have freed up space (emptied your Trash, deleted unnecessary files...), or increased its capacity.
Error Are you connected to the Internet?: Are you connected to the Internet? You can nevertheless read the content of your note below in degraded mode.
Error Your computer's disk space is insu: Your computer's disk space is insufficient
Error The {0} `{1}` could not be written: The {0} `{1}` could not be written to your computer disk because there is not enough space available.
Error Synchronization will resume as soo: Synchronization will resume as soon as you have freed up space (emptied your Trash, deleted unnecessary files…).
Error Syncdir is empty: Look like you Cozy folder got emptied. May be it is on a hard-drive which is not plugged at the moment? To avoid losing your data, this will not be synchronized.
Error Your Cozy could not be found: Your Cozy could not be found
Error This note could not be found: This note could not be found
Error The {0} `{1}` has been simultaneou: The {0} `{1}` has been simultaneously modified on your computer and your Cozy.
Error This message persists if Cozy is u: This message persists if Cozy is unable to resolve this conflict. In this case rename the version you want to keep and click on "Give up".
Error The {0} `{1}` could not be updated: The {0} `{1}` could not be updated on your computer to apply the changes made on your Cozy.
Error Synchronization will resume as soo: Synchronization will resume as soon as you close the opened file(s) blocking this operation or restore sufficient access rights.
Error The {0} `{1}`'s metadata cannot be: The {0} `{1}`'s metadata cannot be accepted by your Cozy.
Error This message persists if the local: This message persists if the local metadata of your document is corrupted. In this case try to move it out of the Cozy Drive folder and back again or contact support for help on the procedure.
Error The {0} `{1}`'s name contains char: The {0} `{1}`'s name contains characters forbidden by your Cozy.
Error Try renaming it without using the: Try renaming it without using the following characters: / \u{0000} \n \u{000D}.
Error Document path with too many levels: Document path with too many levels
Error The {0} `{1}`'s path has too many: The {0} `{1}`'s path has too many levels (i.e. parent folders) for your Cozy.
Error Try removing some parent levels or: Try removing some parent levels or moving it to antoher folder.
Error Cozy Desktop encountered an unexpe: Cozy Desktop encountered an unexpected error while trying to synchronise the {0} `{1}`.
Error Your hosting provider is working o: Your hosting provider is working on fixing the issue and the synchronization will automatically be retried periodically.
Error The synchronization of your docume: The synchronization of your documents is momentarily paused.
Error It will resume once the maintenanc: It will resume once the maintenance is over.
Error Document path incompatible with cu: Document path incompatible with current OS
Error The {0} `{1}`'s name either contai: The {0} `{1}`'s name either contains forbidden characters or is reserved or is too long for your Operating System.
Error Try renaming it on your Cozy witho: Try renaming it on your Cozy without using special characters and choose a shorter name if necessary.
Error The file `{0}` could not be writte: The file `{0}` could not be written to your Cozy's disk because it is larger than the maximum file size allowed by your Cozy: 5 GiB.
Error You need to remove it from your lo: You need to remove it from your local synchronization folder or reduce its size.
Error The name of {0} `{1}` is conflicti: The name of {0} `{1}` is conflicting with an existing document.
Error You need to rename this {0} to sol: You need to rename this {0} to solve the conflict.
Error The remote directory `{0}` was exc: The remote directory `{0}` was excluded from the synchronization on this device.
Error The local directory with the same: The local directory with the same path can either be linked to the remote one which will be synchronized again or be renamed to solve this conflict.
Error Cozy Desktop encountered an unexpe: Cozy Desktop encountered an unexpected error while trying to reach your Cozy.
Error Your hosting provider is working o: Your hosting provider is working on fixing the issue and the synchronization will resume once it is fixed.
Folder You can now synchronize your Cozy: You can now synchronize your Cozy with this computer.
Folder By default all the documents on y: By default all the documents on your Cozy will be synchronized.
Folder The documents selected on your Co: The documents selected on your Cozy will be synchronized on this computer in
Folder You cannot synchronize your data: You cannot synchronize your data directly in
Folder Select a location for your Cozy f: Seleziona una posizione per la tua cartella Cozy:
Folder You cannot synchronize your whole: Non puoi sincronizzare il tuo intero sistema o una cartella personale.
Help [ The more you can say about the is: [ Più puoi dirci sul problema, e meglio è: hai molti file? sono grandi? il tuo cozy è aggiornato? ]
Help An error occured while sending your: An error occured while sending your email. Please contact the support.
Help I like a lot what you do, but I hav: Mi piace tanto quello che fate, ma ho un problema:
Help Multi Computer: If you use several computers with this cozy, sending the log from the other ones as well will help us pinpoint the issue.
Help Our community grows everyday and wi: La nostra community cresce ogni giorno e sarà felice di darti una mano in uno di questi media:
Help There are still a few more options: Ci sono ancora altre opzioni per contattarci:
Help We will get back to you as soon as: Saremo da te il prima possibile.
Help You can send us feedback, report bu: Puoi inviarci feedback, segnalare bug o chiedere assistenza.
Help Your mail has been sent. We will tr: La tua email è stata inviata. Proveremo a risponderti molto presto!
InvalidConfiguration Please log out and: Please log out and go through the onboarding again or contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc
InvalidDoc Naming rules for each Operati: Naming rules for each Operating System
InvalidDoc File names, extension include: File names, extension included, cannot be more than 256 characters long.
InvalidDoc Folder names cannot be more t: Folder names cannot be more than 243 characters long.
InvalidDoc Document names, extension inc: Document names, extension included, cannot be more than {0} characters long.
InvalidDoc Document paths (i.e. document: Document paths (i.e. document name + all its ancestors' names) cannot be more than {0} characters long.
InvalidDoc Document names cannot include: Document names cannot include the following characters:
InvalidDoc Folder names and file extensi: Folder names and file extensions cannot end with the following characters:
InvalidDoc The following document names: The following document names are forbidden:
Password Your password for the cozy addr: La tua password per l'indirizzo cozy:
Reinitialization - if some document dele: - if some document deletions were not synchronized, these documents will re-appear if you don't delete them beforehand on the other side;
Reinitialization - if some files exist o: - if some files exist on both sides but have different content then conflicts will be created so you can choose the version you wish to keep;
Reinitialization - if some files are onl: - if some files are only present on your Cozy or your computer, they will be added to the other side;
Reinitialization - files already identic: - files already identical on both sides won't be impacted.
Reinitialization Are you sure you want t: Are you sure you want to reinitialize the synchronization?
Revoked In case you didn't, contact us a: In case you didn't, contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc
Revoked Synchronization with your Cozy i: Synchronization with your Cozy is unavailable, maybe you revoked this computer?
Settings Install the new release and res: Installa la nuova versione e riavvia l'applicazione
Settings Start Cozy Drive on system star: Esegui Cozy Drive all'avvio del sistema
Settings Startup: Il tuo Cozy verrà sincronizzato automaticamente con il tuo computer
Settings The synchronization of the loca: The synchronization of the local Cozy folder with your personal Cozy Cloud will be entirely rebuilt.
SyncDirEmpty Detail: To avoid losing your data, this will not be synchronized. If you really want to reset the synchronization, you can just remove your Cozy folder.
SyncDirEmpty Message: Look like you Cozy folder got emptied. May be it is on a hard-drive which is not plugged at the moment?
SyncDirUnlinked The client will restart: Per abilitarla di nuovo, devi selezionare una nuova cartella Cozy.
SyncDirUnlinked Title: Hai eliminato la tua cartella Cozy
SyncDirUnlinked You have removed your sy: Hai eliminato la tua cartella Cozy, a causa di questa operazione la sincronizzazione è stata interrotta.
Unlink Detail: I tuoi file non saranno più sincronizzati con il tuo Cozy.
Unlink Message: Sei sicuro di voler scollegare il tuo Cozy?
Unlinked Else, you can just close Cozy D: Altrimenti, puoi semplicemente chiudere Cozy Drive.
Unlinked If you want to register it agai: Se vuoi registrarlo di nuovo, puoi riavviare Cozy Drive.
Unlinked Your device has been unlinked: Il tuo dispositivo è stato scollegato
Unlinked Your device is no longer regist: Il tuo dispositivo non è più registrato nel tuo Cozy.
Updater Error ENOSPC: Your disk is full, update cannot be downloaded.
Updater Error Other: An unspecified error prevented update. Please contact the support.
Updater Please wait: Please wait for the update to be downloaded.
Updater It may take a while: It may take a while, depending on your Internet connection speed.
Welcome Your own private cloud: Benvenuto su Cozy Driver per Desktop !
